Happy to announce a new release of [dream-html](https://github.com/yawaramin/dream-html):
*** pure-html
- Add ~plaintext-only~ value for [~contenteditable~](https://yawaramin.github.io/dream-html/pure-html/Pure_html/HTML/index.html#val-contenteditable) attribute - Join CSS classes together when [adding](https://yawaramin.github.io/dream-html/pure-html/Pure_html/index.html#val-(+@)) a ~class~ attribute to a node that already has one - Escape ~<~ and ~>~ characters in HTML attributes to prevent [mXSS attacks](https://bughunters.google.com/blog/5038742869770240/escaping-and-in-attributes-how-it-helps-protect-against-mutation-xss)
*** dream-html
- Add [~Dream_html.if_none_match~](https://yawaramin.github.io/dream-html/dream-html/Dream_html/#val-if_none_match) and ~if_match~ helpers for conditional requests using ETags - Add [~fold~](https://yawaramin.github.io/dream-html/pure-html/Pure_html/index.html#val-fold) function to traverse nodes - Remove some incorrect path validation from the [PPX](https://yawaramin.github.io/dream-html/dream-html/Ppx/index.html)
